## :package: Installation

You can install **northstar** from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("andrewallenbruce/northstar")
```

## :beginner: Usage

```{r setup, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(northstar)
library(dplyr)
```


### Search Fee Schedule

```{r}
search_fee_schedule(
  hcpcs    = "33935",
  state    = "GA",
  locality = "01",
  mac      = "10212") |> 
  glimpse()
```

### Search ICD-10-CM

```{r}
icd10cm(code = "T38.0X1A") |> 
  glimpse()
```
